definitions: The quality or state of having a sharp, pungent taste or smell; not sweet.
A feeling of anger, hurt, or resentment due to unfair treatment or disappointment.
The quality of being harsh or unpleasant, especially in tone or manner.
examples: The bitterness of the dark chocolate was intense.
He felt a deep bitterness about his lost opportunity.
There was a certain bitterness in her voice.
